name: part_003
file: tmp_【新衣装3Dお披露目】AZKi 6th Anniversary Live ＂百花繚乱＂【#AZKi新衣装3Dライブ】 [bHXB9qI2olE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: AZKi and Nekomata Okayu continue their performance of 'Neko-Kaburino' accompanied by a pink cat mascot.
AZKi and Usada Pekora perform 'Peko Ran Damu Brain!'.

subtitles.original: ...して
嫌いだけど好き まずくても美味しい
subtitles.english: I hate it but I like it, even if it's bad, it's delicious.

subtitles.original: 着ぐるみを着てハグしてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll put on a costume and give you a hug.

subtitles.original: 泣かせないように 怒らせないように
subtitles.english: So as not to make you cry, so as not to make you angry.

subtitles.original: 丁度良く君と遊びたいのだ
subtitles.english: I just want to play with you perfectly.

subtitles.english: Neko-kaburino Neko-kaburino

subtitles.original: みんな自分疑ってるかい？

subtitles.english: It's the worst but I'm happy, even if it's tough, I'm fine.

subtitles.original: あべこべな夢を見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a topsy-turvy dream.

subtitles.original: 傷つけないように 追い詰めないように

subtitles.english: Ran-ran boisterous dance, now, let's scream.

subtitles.english: It's an incident, every day is tough.

subtitles.original: 大成功のタネだと
subtitles.english: They say it's the seed of great success.

subtitles.original: 笑えない 冗談 笑え
subtitles.english: A joke you can't laugh at, laugh.

subtitles.english: Peko Ran Damu Brain!

subtitles.original: ぺこらんだむ しちゃいなまえ
subtitles.english: Do the Peko Ran Damu.

subtitles.english: NO NO NO, know it, rake it up.

subtitles.original: ギュンとプロペラ 回れ

subtitles.original: どこへ？ 疑わしい？ 知らない 知らないんだ

subtitles.original: ほら 世界は繋がっちゃう 繋がっちゃう

subtitles.original: 境界越えたらきっかけ

subtitles.original: それに会いたいって 思うんだ

subtitles.original: 退屈 嫌だったら こっち来れば

subtitles.original: 大事な場所なんてさ 自分で作らなくちゃ
